item.description:
The Minnesota Inventors Congress presents it's 55th annual

2012 Invention & Idea Show

"The connection for inventors and the experts who fuel their entry into the marketplace"

 

Friday, June 8th and Saturday, June 9th.

10am to 6pm

 

Redwood Area Community Center

901 Cook St

Redwood Falls, Minnesota

 

www.MinnesotaInventorsCongress.org

 

Those who would like to get a booth should register early (before May 11th). Booth prices seem to be in the range of $150 to $345 for inventors and to $395 for vendors.
item.name: 2012 Invention & Idea Show
